decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Troll of Khazad-d√ªm using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, and then bring them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck also includes disruption spells like Force of Will and Thoughtseize to protect the combo pieces. Additionally, the deck has some utility creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Brazen Borrower to provide additional value. The mana base includes lands like Underground Sea and Wasteland for consistency and disruption.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's plays through a combination of counterspells, hand disruption, and removal spells while maintaining a tempo advantage with efficient creatures. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze, the deck aims to control the game early on. Additionally, the deck includes powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf to apply pressure and close out the game quickly. The inclusion of cards like Psychic Frog and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student allows for additional card advantage and manipulation to stay ahead in the game.

This Bant Aggro deck focuses on maximizing value through synergies between creatures and spells, with a strong emphasis on blinking and recursion. The deck utilizes cards like Ephemerate, Eternal Witness, and Yorion, Sky Nomad to generate repeated advantage, while also running disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler and Force of Will to control the game. With a mix of versatile threats such as Ice-Fang Coatl and Knight of Autumn, along with powerful tutors like Green Sun's Zenith and Spellseeker, this deck aims to overwhelm and outvalue opponents in the Legacy format.

The deck is focused on disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells and removal while applying early pressure with efficient creatures like Delver of Secrets. It aims to control the board with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze, while using cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder to dig for threats. Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower provide additional threats that can close out the game quickly. The deck leverages its efficient spells and disruptive elements to maintain tempo and pressure the opponent into making mistakes.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the combo potential of Nadu, Winged Wisdom along with Nomads en-Kor and Springheart Nantuko to generate infinite mana and draw the entire library. This combo is supported by cards like Green Sun's Zenith, Chord of Calling, and Natural Order to tutor for key pieces. The deck also includes mana acceleration with cards like Gaea's Cradle and Noble Hierarch, as well as disruption with Endurance and Collector Ouphe. The ultimate goal is to cast Craterhoof Behemoth and win the game in a single turn.

This combo deck focuses on quickly milling your own deck to find Thassa's Oracle as a win condition. By using cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer, along with the graveyard recursion abilities of cards like Reanimate and Dread Return, you can quickly fill your graveyard and win the game with Thassa's Oracle's triggered ability. With plenty of mana acceleration and disruption in the form of Pact of Negation and Cabal Therapy, this deck aims to win swiftly and efficiently before your opponent can stop you. It's all about comboing off as fast as possible.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, and then reanimating them onto the battlefield with cards like Animate Dead and Reanimate. The goal is to cheat out big threats like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty early in the game to overwhelm the opponent. With strong disruption options like Force of Will and Thoughtseize, as well as efficient creatures like Troll of Khazad-d√ªm and Brazen Borrower, this deck aims to win through powerful combo plays and graveyard shenanigans.

The deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly through spells like Dark Ritual and Cabal Ritual, utilizing Lion's Eye Diamond for additional resources. The main goal is to cast key spells like Infernal Tutor to find win conditions such as Tendrils of Agony or Ad Nauseam to finish off the opponent in a single turn. Thoughtseize and Duress are used to disrupt the opponent's game plan while cards like Ponder and Brainstorm help filter through the deck for crucial combo pieces. The deck's flexibility is enhanced by cards like Burning Wish for additional utility.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy with counterspells and removal spells like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares. It aims to lock down the board with Standstill while efficiently ramping up mana with cards like Flooded Strand and Wasteland. Timeless Dragon provides a big threat while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Teferi, Time Raveler offer card advantage and disruption. The deck also includes powerful board wipes like Supreme Verdict and Wrath of the Skies to reset the battlefield if needed.
